query:
UPDATE blog_posts SET image = CASE 
  WHEN title LIKE '%Interview%' OR title LIKE '%interview%' THEN '/blog-images/interview-preparation.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%ATS%' OR title LIKE '%Scannable%' OR title LIKE '%SCANNABLE%' THEN '/blog-images/ats-resume.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Cover Letter%' OR title LIKE '%COVER LETTER%' THEN '/blog-images/cover-letter.png'
  WHEN title LIKE '%LinkedIn%' OR title LIKE '%LINKEDIN%' THEN '/blog-images/linkedin-optimization.png'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Template%' OR title LIKE '%TEMPLATE%' THEN '/blog-images/resume-template.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Job%' OR title LIKE '%JOB%' OR title LIKE '%Career%' THEN '/blog-images/job-search-strategy.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Resume%' OR title LIKE '%RESUME%' OR title LIKE '%Résumé%' THEN '/blog-images/career-advice.jpg'
  ELSE '/blog-images/career-advice.jpg'
END;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute UPDATE blog_posts SET image = CASE 
  WHEN title LIKE '%Interview%' OR title LIKE '%interview%' THEN '/blog-images/interview-preparation.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%ATS%' OR title LIKE '%Scannable%' OR title LIKE '%SCANNABLE%' THEN '/blog-images/ats-resume.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Cover Letter%' OR title LIKE '%COVER LETTER%' THEN '/blog-images/cover-letter.png'
  WHEN title LIKE '%LinkedIn%' OR title LIKE '%LINKEDIN%' THEN '/blog-images/linkedin-optimization.png'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Template%' OR title LIKE '%TEMPLATE%' THEN '/blog-images/resume-template.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Job%' OR title LIKE '%JOB%' OR title LIKE '%Career%' THEN '/blog-images/job-search-strategy.jpg'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Resume%' OR title LIKE '%RESUME%' OR title LIKE '%Résumé%' THEN '/blog-images/career-advice.jpg'
  ELSE '/blog-images/career-advice.jpg'
END;
